text:
@NYGovCuomo Fact Vs Myth
#COVID19   

Can regular rinsing your nose👃 with saline help prevent infection against #coronavirus?

NO ‼️There is no evidence that regular rinsing of nose with saline can protect people from infection with #Covid_19 https://t.co/Y3xUQ9IA2D
